name: part_001
file: tmp_【Mini 3D Live】hololive ID 3rd Generation h3ro Night Live #h3roNightLive [dQ_i_bGR3Zo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Kobo Kanaeru, Kaela Kovalskia, and Vestia Zeta perform the song 'Kopi Dangdut'.
MC section where the members introduce themselves and talk to the audience on the beach.
The members transition to a game area on the beach.

subtitles.original: Kopi Dangdut
subtitles.english: Kopi Dangdut

subtitles.original: #h3roNightLive
subtitles.english: #h3roNightLive

subtitles.original: Nana nana mengapa kamu datang lagi menggodaku?
subtitles.english: Nana nana, why did you come back to tempt me?

subtitles.original: Dulu hatiku membeku bagaikan segumpal salju.
subtitles.english: Before, my heart was frozen like a lump of snow.

subtitles.original: Ku tak mau peduli biar hitam biar putih.
subtitles.english: I don't want to care, whether it's black or white.

subtitles.original: Melangkah berhati-hati asal jangan nyebur ke kali.
subtitles.english: Stepping carefully, as long as I don't fall into the river.

subtitles.original: Api asmara yang dahulu pernah membara...
subtitles.english: The flame of passion that once burned...

subtitles.original: ...Semakin hangat bagai ciuman yang pertama.
subtitles.english: ...is getting warmer like a first kiss.

subtitles.original: Detak jantungku seakan ikut irama...
subtitles.english: My heartbeat seems to follow the rhythm...

subtitles.original: ...Karena terlena oleh pesona alunan Kopi Dangdut.
subtitles.english: ...because I'm lulled by the charm of the Kopi Dangdut rhythm.

subtitles.original: Irama Kopi Dangdut yang ceria...
subtitles.english: The cheerful Kopi Dangdut rhythm...

subtitles.original: ...Menyengat hati menjadi gairah.
subtitles.english: ...stings the heart into passion.

subtitles.original: Membuat aku lupa akan cintaku yang telah lalu.
subtitles.english: Making me forget about my past love.

subtitles.original: Kala kupandang kerlip bintang nun jauh di sana...
subtitles.english: When I look at the twinkling stars far away...

subtitles.original: ...Sayup kudengar melodi cinta yang menggema.
subtitles.english: ...faintly I hear the melody of love echoing.

subtitles.original: Terasa kembali gelora jiwa mudaku...
subtitles.english: The passion of my young soul feels like it's back...

subtitles.original: ...Karena tersentuh alunan lagu semerdu Kopi Dangdut.
subtitles.english: ...because I'm touched by a song as sweet as Kopi Dangdut.

subtitles.original: Api asmara yang dahulu pernah membara...
subtitles.english: The flame of passion that once burned...

subtitles.original: ...Semakin hangat bagai ciuman yang pertama.
subtitles.english: ...is getting warmer like a first kiss.

subtitles.original: Detak jantungku seakan ikut irama...
subtitles.english: My heartbeat seems to follow the rhythm...

subtitles.original: ...Karena terlena oleh pesona alunan Kopi Dangdut.
subtitles.english: ...because I'm lulled by the charm of the Kopi Dangdut rhythm.

subtitles.original: Karena terlena oleh pesona alunan Kopi Dangdut.
subtitles.english: Because I'm lulled by the charm of the Kopi Dangdut rhythm.

subtitles.original: Karena terlena oleh pesona alunan Kopi Dangdut.
subtitles.english: Because I'm lulled by the charm of the Kopi Dangdut rhythm.

subtitles.original: HEEEY! HUUU! Adi sawer bang! Di sawer!
subtitles.english: HEEEY! HUUU! Give us tips, mister! Tips!

subtitles.original: Di sawer! Di sawer!
subtitles.english: Give us tips! Give us tips!

subtitles.original: Gila goyangan kita tuh!
subtitles.english: Our dancing was crazy!

subtitles.original: Seru banget!
subtitles.english: So much fun!

subtitles.original: Huff... Paling capek sih kita.
subtitles.english: Huff... We're the most tired.

subtitles.original: Lumayan lah ya tadi, goyangannya boleh lah ya ni?
subtitles.english: That was pretty good, the dancing was okay, right?

subtitles.original: Gimana penonton juga goyang nggak? Soyaaa!
subtitles.english: Did the audience dance too? Soyaaa!

subtitles.original: Goyang!
subtitles.english: Dance!

subtitles.original: Wae gila tunggu perkenalan dulu nggak sih? Ayo cewek-cewek cantik ini.
subtitles.english: Wait, shouldn't we introduce ourselves first? Come on, you beautiful girls.

subtitles.original: Siapa nih... ini yang satu ini, cewek ini.
subtitles.english: Who is this... this one, this girl.

subtitles.original: Ayo, ayo, ayo!
subtitles.english: Come on, come on, come on!

subtitles.original: Halo! A-a-a... mission status! Halo aku Vestia Zeta dari hololive Indonesia gen 3! Nice to meet you!
subtitles.english: Hello! A-a-a... mission status! Hi, I'm Vestia Zeta from hololive Indonesia Gen 3! Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: Goyangannya dong kakak!
subtitles.english: Show us your dance move!

subtitles.original: Goyang! Sampe bawah! Sampe bawah! Sampe bawah! Oke next!
subtitles.english: Dance! Down to the bottom! Down to the bottom! Down to the bottom! Okay, next!

subtitles.original: Ini yang satu ini!
subtitles.english: This one!

subtitles.original: Hi! Hello everyone! My name is Kaela Kovalskia, the coolest blacksmith from hololive ID third generation!
subtitles.english: Hi! Hello everyone! My name is Kaela Kovalskia, the coolest blacksmith from hololive ID third generation!

subtitles.original: Third generation jangan lupa!
subtitles.english: Don't forget the third generation!

subtitles.original: Third generation!
subtitles.english: Third generation!

subtitles.original: Goyangannya dong Kaela!
subtitles.english: Show us your dance move, Kaela!

subtitles.original: Goyang! Sampe bawah! Sampe... iiih! Oke!
subtitles.english: Dance! Down to the bottom! Down... eeek! Okay!

subtitles.original: Ih seksi! Ya udah lah Kobo Kobo.
subtitles.english: So sexy! Alright, Kobo Kobo.

subtitles.original: Kobo Kobo! Kobo Kanaeru at your service!
subtitles.english: Kobo Kobo! Kobo Kanaeru at your service!

subtitles.original: Let me be your sun to shine your day! Hehe!
subtitles.english: Let me be your sun to shine your day! Hehe!

subtitles.original: Sampurasun! Kobo Kanaeru dari hololive ID gen 3! Yoroshiku onegaishimasu!
subtitles.english: Sampurasun! Kobo Kanaeru from hololive ID Gen 3! Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: Eh kalian nggak ada yang mau nge-hype apa gitu?
subtitles.english: Hey, aren't you guys going to hype me up or something?

subtitles.original: Oh iya! Sampe bawah!
subtitles.english: Oh right! Down to the bottom!

subtitles.original: Sampe bawah! Ayo ayo!
subtitles.english: Down to the bottom! Come on, come on!

subtitles.original: Kenapa aku jadi ikutan? Wow mantap!
subtitles.english: Why am I joining in? Wow, great!

subtitles.original: Ya! Wah dorong terus! Mantap!
subtitles.english: Yeah! Keep pushing! Great!

subtitles.original: Banyak SS nih ya guys ni pasti aku yakin banget penonton banyak SS.
subtitles.english: Lots of screenshots, guys. I'm sure the audience is taking many screenshots.

subtitles.original: Hastag-nya dipakai! Hastag-nya dipakai ya #h3roNightLive!
subtitles.english: Use the hashtag! Use the hashtag #h3roNightLive!

subtitles.original: Nanti kita lihat semua SS-nya oke?
subtitles.english: We'll check out all the screenshots later, okay?

subtitles.original: Oke tadi lagunya tentang apa dulu nih?
subtitles.english: Okay, so what was that song about?

subtitles.original: Lagunya tentang Kopi Dangdut!
subtitles.english: The song was about Kopi Dangdut!

subtitles.original: Kopi Dangdut!
subtitles.english: Kopi Dangdut!

subtitles.original: Nyantai... asik...
subtitles.english: Relaxing... cool...

subtitles.original: Asik! Seru banget!
subtitles.english: Cool! So much fun!

subtitles.original: Ini kita... kalian nyadar nggak sih dari tadi kita di pantai?
subtitles.english: How about... did you guys realize we've been on the beach this whole time?

subtitles.original: Terus kita pakai baju...
subtitles.english: And we're wearing...

subtitles.original: Iya kita juga pakai baju renang!
subtitles.english: Yes, we're also wearing swimsuits!

subtitles.original: Pertama kalinya kan kalian lihat? Iya!
subtitles.english: It's the first time you've seen this, right? Yes!

subtitles.original: Kalo kayak gini enaknya kita main dulu nggak sih?
subtitles.english: If it's like this, wouldn't it be fun to play first?

subtitles.original: Mau main! Mau main! Main game!
subtitles.english: I want to play! I want to play! Play a game!

subtitles.original: Main game ayo!
subtitles.english: Let's play a game!

subtitles.original: Oke ayo kita main game sekarang!
subtitles.english: Okay, let's play a game now!

subtitles.original: Ayo ayo! Main main! Ke sana yuk!
subtitles.english: Come on! Let's play! Let's go over there!

subtitles.original: Itu ada yang menarik kayaknya di situ.
subtitles.english: There seems to be something interesting over there.

subtitles.original: Yeay ayo semua ke sini!
subtitles.english: Yeay, everyone come here!

subtitles.original: Main main main main main sini sini!
subtitles.english: Play play play play play, over here!
